pullrequest.title: Allow udp or tcp for publishing joint commands (so we can use python)

content.html:
see issue #111 for details

Based on the data from #111, we should enable tcpNoDelay option if reliable connection is needed and achieve near udp performance.

diff -r 9d2a424ed5cf ros/atlas_msgs/AtlasPlugin.cpp
--- a/ros/atlas_msgs/AtlasPlugin.cpp    Thu Jan 31 17:33:12 2013 -0800
+++ b/ros/atlas_msgs/AtlasPlugin.cpp    Thu Jan 31 19:16:27 2013 -0800
@@ -395,7 +395,8 @@
   // Note that we'll still accept TCP connections for this topic
   // (e.g., from rospy nodes, which don't support UDP);
   // we just prefer UDP.
-  jointCommandsSo.transport_hints = ros::TransportHints().unreliable().reliable();
+  jointCommandsSo.transport_hints =
+    ros::TransportHints().unreliable().reliable().tcpNoDelay(true);

   this->subJointCommands=
     this->rosNode->subscribe(jointCommandsSo);

pullrequest.title: Allow udp or tcp for publishing joint commands (so we can use python)

content.raw: should we make this tcpNoDelay as well?
content.html: should we make this tcpNoDelay as well?
